_header: In some religion as we read
_description: A Monk sees a vision of Our Lady, a miracle of the Virgin Mary

BLEge2810.First Lines: In some religion as we redeþis [  ]sage is fulfyld in dede…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …To go with gre þat he may gahe graunt his grace hit may swa
BLEge2810.Note: Added to an originally blank side between 4765 and 333.
BLEge2810.Editions:
Tryon,  Ruth Wilson. 
             “Miracles of Our Lady in Middle English Verse.” 
             PMLA
         38 (1923): 308-81: 320-2.
